name: user_timeline
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool twitter_pack_v2.
Tool description: Complete pack to get any public information on twitter, includes Twitter Trends, Search Tweet, User Activity
API description: Fetches the tweet timeline for a specified user ID.

user_id.description: The unique identifier of the Twitter user whose timeline is to be fetched.

cursor.description: Cursor for pagination to fetch the next set of results. Defaults to 'HBaEgNKVxpvYtS0AAA=='.

count.description: Number of tweets to retrieve. Defaults to 10.
